data.title: RV Resort in Heber City, Utah
data.meta_description: RV Resort located in beautiful Heber City, Utah. Mountain Valley RV Resort welcomes you to one of the finest RV resorts in the Western United States and the highest rated park in Utah.
data.text:
We are excited to let everyone know that we are at full build out! Our family friendly side of the resort has 98 sites varying in sizes from a 40′ back in to a large 80′ pull through. The family friendly section of the resort has 2 pools and 2 hot tubs, basketball court, 3 pickleball courts, 2 laundry rooms and more! Our phase 2 (adults only) has 95 large 80’x30’ full hook-up sites. (resort map) All of the amenities in phase 2 are for adults … clubhouse, pool, spa, laundry room, pickle ball courts, restrooms and dog park. The new clubhouse features, conference room with kitchen, indoor/outdoor fireplace, exercise room, large foyer with large screen TV and pool table.

This new, luxurious area is perfect for those who want to extend their stays beyond a couple of days or even beyond a week.
